p: Another example of the camphor amide derivatives is presented in Figure 29. Those heterocyclics were tested as potential vaccinia virus (VV) inhibitors [ 98]. Bioassay results revealed that synthesized amides with 4-methylpiperidine 113a and morpholine 114b fragments show the best inhibitory activity against VV with the IC 50 values of 2.5 and 7.5 ÂµM, respectively, with low cytotoxicity.
